title: Could we get a rune for running through units/minions?
body: Instead of giving this passive to {{item:3046}} , maybe a rune would be necessary? There are countless complaints of creep block and considering it's a legit mechanic, maybe we could just stop loading crit items with the mobility they don't really need :D and help everyone out.

replies.body: um the ghost summoner spell?

> [{quoted}](name=HexHackersGaming,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5Wt8thxN,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-09-18T14:22:54.520+0000)
>
> um the ghost summoner spell?

True, but still I'm looking for something that doesn't require your ultimate (nimbus cloak rune) or a long cooldown {{summoner:6}}  as this is such a game breaking thing that either they need to do away with minion collision, fix the bugs that make it crazy, or give us a reasonable way around it.

Having an easily accessible permanent unit pass-through may be a bit op.  I think it would still have to be gated somehow (to prevent people just standing in minions to avoid skillshots).  I'm not sure what could be a reasonable trigger though.
